safetyTips: Deliveries are in paper bags and dropped at a social distance.
name: EMPORIA FABRIC & CRAFT
description: We sell fabric and sewing patterns as well as school uniform for Norton Knatchbull, St Anselms and St Marys schools. We are delivering within Ashford by car or by post. You can also collect from the shop on a Tuesday and a Friday. Order via website or email.
